message: Las zapatillas son hermosas tal cual se la ve en la foto, el talle pareciera un poquito más chico que otras marcas, pero quedaron ok.
Too small
excelente producto
Great style and durable material. Very good shoe. Buy a 1/2 size up, runs small. Will buy again.
El zapato es bonito a pesar de ser de tela la mayor parte. La talla es más pequeña que en otras marcas
They are light weight, seems very comfortable and easy to put on. No complaints for my toddler.
Ordered them for my niece and she loved them.
I really love those shoes for my 5 year old because they are very comfortable and he can run all over the place with them with no complaints .
Bonito color
Size up! My daughters old sneaker on the left os a size 6 and the new puma pink one on the right is size 7. Nice shoe so I ordered the 8 and it's on its way. Hoping they fit.

These are Super Cute and I LOVE them! They are great Shoes for my pre-k daughter. Perfect fit love that this allows those on a budget to get their kids some Puma Shoes. My issue is on how quickly and easy they get dirty. My daughter's only had them a week and they are dirty already and she only wears them to school and back. Otherwise great Quality Shoes!
These are the best shoes for toddlers. I just keep buying the next size as my son grows out of the old ones. I buy two pair for every size. I’ve purchased 6 pair in total. He loves them!
Super easy for my little one to get on. It’s seems as though these run smaller than other puma styles. I have to size up. Sending back for half size bigger.
My 8-year-old loves these shoes and they've held up really well.
They were perfect -he loved them
Not true to size
Fits well. Good Purchase
I purchased these shoes for my daughter (4yrs old). She loves them. They're perfect for school with the velcro straps.
Perfect fit for the little girl they were purchased for. A little extra room so she cam grow into them also. Perfect!
Me agrado la calidad del producto y al Niño le gustó y le quedó perfecto su número gracias
This shoe held up to the wear and tear of a toddler. The straps made it easy enough for him to put on his shoes on his own. This was a good buy.
They came in 3 sizes too small. Not true to size
Puma runs small and had to return. It was a full size smaller. The sneaker looks great though
Runs a full size small. Ordered toddler size 7 and it was the same length as our size 6 Puma Smash sneaker.
Great shoe, true to size.
The media could not be loaded. Dan una talla 22 de niño en Ecuador

Was alittle nervous about spending the money on these, but it was so worth it. My LO is is 21lbs and 11 months going on one, these fit wonderful I got the 5toddler though he’s currently in 4toddler an I’m glad I went a size up since he’s only growing. The inside is soft an very comfy. Has for durability I will have to get back to this post in the next month too say how it held up. But for now I’m very happy on how it looks on he’s feet.
Very cute shoes, but the fit was a bit off.
My baby likes them and looks very nice when she wears them
A mí hijo le encantan dice que son los zapatos de Sonic
As described and were a big hit
Definitely size up, they are too narrow on the front so my kid complained that it hurt his toes, just size up and you would be fine.

My son chose these shoes. No lie. He saw me scrolling and took his little finger and scrolled it back to these shoes and touched the picture and said, "wow!! I like this mom!!!" ... Of course I had to buy it at this point. When it arrived I thought he had forgotten about it already, but when we opened the box, his face lit up so bright when he realized it's the shoes he saw on my phone. He was over the moon!!... It wasn't until he finally got to wear them to go out, that he said they're his spiderman shoes. Of course--blure and red are spiderman's colors. And he loves these shoes so much. Durability is great. He's worn them almost every day all through  autumn and winter. They've held up so we'll, that I might just give them away for hand-me-downs when he outgrows them... And I'll probably have to buy him a bigger pair of spiderman shoes.
They are very cute look comfy but are for slimmer feet,and run small

My daughter uses a size 9 (U.S size)  these shoes fit like a sz 8 1/2.  I’m comparing this to Targets ( Cat & Jack ) shoes.  I would size up a bit if your able too. Shoes are cute & durable.  We will grab another pair.
My Daughter and Grandchild love the shoes
Comfortable shoes
My daughter loves these shoes. Only unfortunate thing is that they attract dirt quickly and easily. Impossible to keep looking clean if you go on basic walks and to the park.

My son loves these shoes. We struggle with shoes that he comfortable with and after buying three different brands these ones he left on all day the first day we put them on. He jumped all day ran and didn’t take them off ones. Hoping this style doesn’t get discontinued.
My baby loved it. Wouldn’t take it out of his feet
Always loved the Puma brand and it’s now fun to see on my son. He loves these shoes. At first the Velcro is a bit tight for a toddler to do on their own but loosens up with use and is now very easy
It is light weight but I'm not sure about durability as it's okay but doesn't look too strong and runs very small
Lindas
Great stylish shoe for my toddler at a great price

We have the black versions that we purchased elsewhere while back. Comparing these and the black ones, the materials feel different, not sure if it’s a knock off or just cheaply made. Also- that blue marks for stitching?! Both shoes, both sides. I’m sorry, but no. 3 stars only because they are super cute and colors are good and they did fit good but not like our original black ones.
Machine washable!!!!!! Sturdy shoes. Great fit.

I ordered a toddler size 5 and they’re smaller than my toddlers size 4. I already threw away the box so I can’t return. I made the mistake of assuming the sizing would be correct. I would order at least a whole size up.

My 1.5 year old does great in these size 6. Great transition shoe after soft sole. They got dirty in the dusty pink color pretty soon, but that’s expected for a toddler. She seems to balance well and they’re lightweight.

These shoes fit way too tight on my son. shoes are not very wide so we could barely buckle the Velcro. For reference my son fits really well into cat and Jack Velcro sneakers from target In size 9 but these puma in size 9 felt more like an eight and are very narrow.

I like the shoes but runs small. Also, the return process is not easy like returning other Amazon products. I have to print a label and find another package. So I will be reducing the amount of things I buy on Amazon from now on.
OUTSTANDING QUALITY at a great price, quality and construction that I'd expect only in serious adult athletic shoes. I recommend HIGHLY
After only two uses, the Velcro on the straps came off!😢

My daughter LOVES this shoe! We had bought her another pair as well to see which is better and she made a beeline for these shoes! It’s very lightweight, which is important bc she has low muscle tone, and heavy shoes make it difficult for her to walk. It’s also nice that it has the two velcros because she has to have inserts, and the Velcro's come in handy not only slipping the velcros in but her chubby feet also slide in a lot easier.
These shoes fit true to size. My daughter loves them a lot.
Love these shoes; they are a little small/narrow but otherwise exactly what you expect
Very nice  thank you 😊
These shoes are very durable and don't get dirty easily!
Look at my review
cute but run small
Super cute but too small for my preschooler. Will order a full size up next time
The shoes are great but run a little smaller than her other shoes of the same size. But My granddaughter loves them because they are so comfortable. She loves the padding. She's happy so I am tooI.
I got these for my 18 month old. The insoles have a guide to help to determine if the shoe will fit, which is super helpful!

Super cute! Great tread for little runners. I bought them for my daughter when she just started walking, so she crawled a lot too. When she would crawl, the shoes would get very dirty quickly, a run thru the wash would do it, but after a few months, the dirt did stain the light pink of the shoe So, def buy for kids who are no longer crawling if ordering the light color shoe
Was not to thrilled with the quality ..
Muy suaves comodos fácil de poner y lijeros
Perfect fit for my 15 month old!

They are a bit snug but I believe it's due to the padding. My son is a size 7 and in size 8 it fits ever so slightly loose but the velcro straps help keep it nice and snug on his feet. Also, this gives him a good opportunity to grow into them.
I was excited for these but they are too narrow and my son won’t even wear them. I’m happy to sell to someone if they want to try them for less money!
My sister love it
Tough and durable shoe for a rough little boy. These shoes hold up very well for my son and he loves them. I will be getting more
The media could not be loaded. Los usa diario y están perfectos
My son has chubby little feet and these shoes are wide enough to fit and are really comfy, he says. They are adorable and fit, so we will keep buying these as often as they’re available.
Way too small for my little.
very good quality tennis, soft and comfortable, my girl loved them

This is a nice looking shoe, even looks better in person but it runs way too small and had to return and didn't want to chance it again and get the wrong size again.  With today's technology and the cost of returns you would think sizes would be more consistent by now.
Not built for an active 7 year old.  Already has holes and he has had them for 2 months - probably wears them 2-3 days a week.
Got these for my 2 yrs old grandbaby for fall,  very comfy and durable. She loves taking walks and playing outside!
They fit my niece perfectly
My daughter loves them. A little narrow but expected for the brand.

Very cute shoes but seem to run a tad small.  We bought them in my son's next size but they fit now whereas his other new shoes have room still.  However, they are cute and great quality so we are happy!
I don't have to tie shoes or worry if it came undone at school👍👍👍👍

These are the perfect school shoes for little ones. My daughter thinks these shoes make her so fast. The only complaint I have is I ordered a US 11 and they run really small and are the same size as her previous other brand US10s. But for the price and style, I will order the next size up next time. She loves them.

I listened to others and bought one size larger for my Son than with other shoes, and it fit him. These shoes have been great.  Cheaper no-name shoes we recently bought my Son are already starting to have problems with the velcro.  These Pumas have a long strip of velcro, not just at the ends of the straps.  This gives a larger surface area to ensure the straps stay tight.  The rubber on the soles also provides great traction for climbing features at playgrounds.  We have a metal spiral-around-a-pole climbing feature nearby that my Son's other (new) shoes would slip on.  These Pumas grip well and my Son loves that he can climb without needing me to help stabilize his feet.

This is my second Puma purchased for my kindergartener. My son thoroughly enjoys the Velcro hook and loop straps. He says that the shoes are comfortable. I didn’t have any trouble from his first pair, but I would recommend paying close attention to the sizing chart- compare cm to cm with other shoe brands. Other than Puma, my son wears Nike, Adidas, and Sketchers. I noticed the cm length trends smaller per shoe size in Puma than the other brands I listed. It serves a buyer well to GO UP a half of a size. Otherwise, great buy again!

Great Quality. Check the picture. The small shoe was used all day long at daycare for months while baby didn't walk and was just scooting in hard floor and concrete... The shor survived... We tried a few Carters but they looked pretty bad after a week... Also toddler seems to move faster and easier with this shoes, good design. We had such a great experience that we decided to buy it again. The shoes in the pic are size 6 and 7. They run a bit small and narrow( when compared to Adidas)

I'm really glad I didn't pay full price for these. They have lasted for 5 months so far, but after a couple weeks they were already super dirty. I tried to wash them and hardly anything came out. They look gross at this point and the insoles are already worn through at the heel. Just not very durable at all for a 5/6 year old. Definitely not good if they're going to be played in at all.
This is a great Velcro sneaker that holds up well. My son is active and adventurous. These shoes are perfect for everything from city walking to rock and tree climbing.

I really like these shoes, but they run small.  My daughter wears an 8T in the majority of shoe brands, but I sized up to a 9T when I bought these because of the reviews I read for them suggesting you size up.  But they were still a little too small, so I ordered a 10T (no half sizes) and they fit better, but look like clown shoes on my daughter because they're definitely a little too big.  But, oh well, room to grow!  Otherwise, these seem sturdy and are well made.

My son is 19 months old and was a premie so finding shoes in his size has been a challenge since he started walking. I love these Puma! They are easy to get on and off and and I live the material. I will definitely keep purchasing these as he grows older.

They are great quality and the velcro closure is easy to use. My son is in physical therapy and his therapist said they were a good choice for a supportive sneaker. These shoes are a bit tiny. They don't seem to come in half sizes (as far as I've seen), which could be helpful. Either way, size up. They may be a little big for a while, but that's better than being too small. This has been the case with the big kid and women's sizes of Puma Romas as well.
Great looking pair of kid shoes. Ordered toddler size 9, they were a bit tight for the child, waiting for next size to become available

These do run a little snug,  but my son has a little wide feet so may have been the issue. However i have 2 kids so when it wasn't a good fit for one the other got them and they love the shoes. They are good quality. And my youngest finds them very comfortable.
Super cute and comfy for my toddler
Loved
Nice shoe for the price. Seem comfortable and has cute vintage style. They do seem slightly smaller than I was expecting for a chubby toddler foot. Otherwise, very pleased

I ordered a size a little too big for my little ones foot to grow into and he loves his shoes! He walks in them great and he doesn't seem uncomfortable. Plus there is a removable cushion in them that has foot measurements outline that helps as guide for growing feet! Im super pleased with these shoes.
Bought these for my grandkids. Very comfortable and well made
Purchased for one of my littles and they are adorable, flexible... but they ran a little smaller than expected so she won't be in them very long.
Perfection

So I had high hopes for these shoes and they're decent, but I'd put them at the same level (maybe slightly below) Target/Stride Rite's Surprize brand except these come in 1/2 sizes.  I have actually washed these and though you can totally toss them in the washer and let them air dry...they do not wash well to remove stains.  Ours are basically grey and I'm normally really good at taking stains out, but not these...  I'm also highly disappointed in the fact that the stitching has already started to come out.  Normally with a pair of shoes like the Surprize brand...it takes a year of wearing for things to get that far.  For the price, I should have just flat out bought genuine Stride Rite shoes.  My daughter has a wider foot and these DO fit but the toe box isn't as wide as it should be if your kid has a wider foot.
